plot: Derek and his best friend, Clint wait in a deserted neighborhood for Cynthia, "The Girl of Derek's Dreams" to arrive for their first date. As time passes, cynicism and doubt test Derek's faith. Sometimes waiting can be "The Hardest Part."
title: The Hardest Part
plot_es: Derek and his best friend, Clint wait in a deserted neighborhood for Cynthia, "The Girl of Derek's Dreams" to arrive for their first date. As time passes, cynicism and doubt test Derek's faith. Sometimes waiting can be "The Hardest Part."
plot_en: Derek and his best friend, Clint wait in a deserted neighborhood for Cynthia, "The Girl of Derek's Dreams" to arrive for their first date. As time passes, cynicism and doubt test Derek's faith. Sometimes waiting can be "The Hardest Part."
